Interface CarService

All Superinterfaces:
CrudService<CarEntity,Long>
All Known Implementing Classes:
CarServiceImpl
public interface CarService extends CrudService<CarEntity,Long>
Interface CarService defines the operations for managing car entities. It extends the CrudService interface to provide basic CRUD functionalities. Additionally, it includes methods for handling specific car-related queries such as saving, filtering, sorting, and aggregating car data.

This service is responsible for performing operations like saving cars, getting cars within a specific speed interval, grouping cars by certain criteria, retrieving statistics, and more.

  • Method Details

    • save

      Long save(CreateCarDto carDto)
      Saves a new car based on the provided data transfer object (DTO).
      Parameters:
      carDto - the data transfer object containing the car information.
      Returns:
      the ID of the newly saved car.

    • saveAll

      List<Long> saveAll(List<CreateCarDto> cars)
      Saves a list of cars based on the provided list of data transfer objects (DTOs).
      Parameters:
      cars - the list of data transfer objects representing cars.
      Returns:
      a list of IDs of the newly saved cars.

    • sortedCarsBy

      List<CarDto> sortedCarsBy(List<String> parameters, String direction)
      Retrieves a list of cars sorted by the specified parameters and direction.
      Parameters:
      parameters - the list of parameters by which to sort the cars.
      direction - the direction of sorting ('asc' for ascending, 'desc' for descending).
      Returns:
      a list of sorted car DTOs.

    • getCarsWithSpeedInterval

      List<CarDto> getCarsWithSpeedInterval(int minSpeed, int maxSpeed)
      Retrieves a list of cars within the specified speed interval.
      Parameters:
      minSpeed - the minimum speed of the cars to retrieve.
      maxSpeed - the maximum speed of the cars to retrieve.
      Returns:
      a list of car DTOs within the specified speed range.

    • groupByAndAmountOfCars

      List<GroupByDto<Object>> groupByAndAmountOfCars(String map)
      Groups cars by a specific field and returns the number of cars in each group.
      Parameters:
      map - the field by which to group the cars.
      Returns:
      a list of group-by DTOs containing the field and the amount of cars in each group.

    • groupByAndMinMaxPriceStatistic

      List<GroupByAndPriceStatisticDto<Object>> groupByAndMinMaxPriceStatistic(String map)
      Groups cars by a specific field and returns the minimum and maximum price for each group.
      Parameters:
      map - the field by which to group the cars.
      Returns:
      a list of group-by DTOs containing the field and price statistics (min/max).

    • priceSpeedStatistic

      PriceSpeedStatisticDto priceSpeedStatistic()
      Retrieves the price and speed statistics for all cars (minimum, maximum, and average values).
      Returns:
      the price and speed statistics DTO.

    • getCarsWithSortedComponents

      List<CarDto> getCarsWithSortedComponents(String order)
      Retrieves a list of cars with their components sorted according to the specified order.
      Parameters:
      order - the sorting order ('asc' for ascending, 'desc' for descending).
      Returns:
      a list of car DTOs with sorted components.

    • groupByComponentsAndCarsSortedByAmountOfCars

      List<ComponentsWithCarsDto> groupByComponentsAndCarsSortedByAmountOfCars(String order)
      Groups cars by their components and sorts them based on the amount of cars per component.
      Parameters:
      order - the sorting order ('asc' for ascending, 'desc' for descending).
      Returns:
      a list of DTOs containing components and the associated cars sorted by the number of cars per component.

    • getCarsCloseToPrice

      List<CarDto> getCarsCloseToPrice(BigDecimal price)
      Retrieves a list of cars whose prices are closest to the specified price.
      Parameters:
      price - the price to compare with.
      Returns:
      a list of car DTOs whose prices are closest to the specified price.

    • getCarsFilterBy

      List<CarDto> getCarsFilterBy(CarCriterionDto carCriterionDto)
      Retrieves a list of cars filtered by the provided criteria.
      Parameters:
      carCriterionDto - the criteria used for filtering the cars.
      Returns:
      a list of filtered car DTOs.
